body_html:
I had the same issue with mac os.. this fixed the problem:
install brew
brew install python
export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.9.0-py2-none-any.whl
sudo pip install --upgrade $TF_BINARY_URL

body:
I had the same issue with mac os.. this fixed the problem:
install brew
brew install python
export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.9.0-py2-none-any.whl
sudo pip install --upgrade $TF_BINARY_URL
